title: Bonus Episode - Dr. Janice Johnson Dias on Parenting + Jon Laster On The Blapp App
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Educator & Activist Dr. Janice Johnson Dias joins Ebro in the Morning for a compelling conversation on raising children, the importance of affirmations, how important it is for children to see you humanized and admitting your mistakes, and much more. Her new book: 'Parent Like It Matters: How to Raise Joyful, Change-Making Girls' 

New York based comedian Jon Laster created a brand new app to easily find Black Owned Businesses around the world! He comes through Ebro in the Morning to discuss how to help black owned businesses - with his app BLAPP! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

description:
